value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|There must be some way out of this
nightmare realm that Freyja doesn't
know about. We just need to find it.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|No... Dökkálfheimr is completely
under her control now. If Freyja
sealed it off, there is no escape...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Then we need to look for some
clue to defeat her. There has to
be a way!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|With my power at her command,
Freyja rules all dreams... Within
dreams, she cannot be defeated...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We can't defeat her within the realm
of nightmares...and we can't escape
to confront her outside of it.$k$pWhat CAN we do?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Whatever we do, we can't give up.
Think. If we all put our minds to it,
surely we can think of something!$k$p$EFace_Pain|We have to...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|L-let's retreat for now!
This way!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Dream-King Freyr, we must retreat.
Please, this way...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Forgive me... I have done nothing
but bring you trouble.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|No, no. That's not true. You saved
us. And I am very grateful you did.$k$pFreyja, everything she's done...
You cannot blame yourself for
her actions.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...When she was young, Freyja
was timid, compassionate...$k$pBut there were many who mocked
her appearance...all due to a mark
on the underside of her nose.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I had no idea... But I'm sure you
were kind to her, weren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Of course... I am Freyja's elder
brother, after all...$k$pI comforted her... But soon she
smiled for me alone.$k$pThen...having grown, she began to
speak of never parting...of wanting
to be ever in my gentle presence...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Before long, Freyja's
beauty blossomed...$k$pMany sought to court her, but she
allowed none to woo her...$k$pFor this, too, I am no doubt
to blame.$k$p$Sbs150|
